snippet: Setting up video surveillance on a driveway highlights the power of putting such tools in the hands of ordinary people.
abstract: Gadgetwise column on implications of devices like Dropcam, camera that allows video feeds to be accessed over Internet and through cloud storage and then viewed through mobile apps or Web browser; explores possibilities inherent in giving everyday people such a surveillance tool.
lead_paragraph: Setting up video surveillance on a driveway highlights the power of putting such tools in the hands of ordinary people.

headline.print_headline: Dropcam Keeps an Eye on the Neighborhood
headline.main: Dropcam Keeps an Eye on the Neighborhood
